00037 #include "egs_transformations.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 #include <vector>
00041 using std::vector;
00042 
00043 EGS_AffineTransform* EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(EGS_Input *i) {
00044     if( !i ) return 0;
00045     EGS_Input *input; bool delete_it = false;
00046     if( i->isA("transformation") ) input = i;
00047     else {
00048         input = i->takeInputItem("transformation");
00049         if( !input ) return 0;
00050         delete_it = true;
00051     }
00052     EGS_Vector t; vector<EGS_Float> tmp;
00053     int err = input->getInput("translation",tmp);
00054     if( !err && tmp.size() == 3 ) t = EGS_Vector(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]);
00055     EGS_AffineTransform *result;
00056     err = input->getInput("rotation vector",tmp);
00057     if( !err && tmp.size() == 3 )
00058         result = new EGS_AffineTransform(
00059            EGS_RotationMatrix(EGS_Vector(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2])),t);
00060     else {
00061         err = input->getInput("rotation",tmp);
00062         if( !err ) {
00063             if( tmp.size() == 2 ) result = new EGS_AffineTransform(
00064                     EGS_RotationMatrix(tmp[0],tmp[1]),t);
00065             else if( tmp.size() == 3 ) result = new EGS_AffineTransform(
00066                     EGS_RotationMatrix(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]),t);
00067             else if( tmp.size() == 4 ) {
00068                 EGS_Vector tmp1(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]);
00069                 EGS_RotationMatrix R1(tmp1);
00070                 EGS_RotationMatrix R2(EGS_RotationMatrix::rotZ(tmp[3]));
00071                 EGS_RotationMatrix Rtot = R1.inverse()*R2*R1;
00072                 result = new EGS_AffineTransform(Rtot,t);
00073             }
00074             else if( tmp.size() == 9 ) {
00075                 EGS_RotationMatrix R(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2],
00076                                      tmp[3],tmp[4],tmp[5],
00077                                      tmp[6],tmp[7],tmp[8]);
00078                 if( !R.isRotation() )
00079                     egsWarning("getTransformation: the rotation specified by\n"
00080                        "   %g %g %g\n   %g %g %g\n   %g %g %g\n"
00081                        " is not a rotation\n",tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2],
00082                        tmp[3],tmp[4],tmp[5],tmp[6],tmp[7],tmp[8]);
00083                 result = new EGS_AffineTransform(R,t);
00084             }
00085             else result = new EGS_AffineTransform(EGS_RotationMatrix(),t);
00086         }
00087         else result = new EGS_AffineTransform(EGS_RotationMatrix(),t);
00088     }
00089     if( delete_it ) delete input;
00090     return result;
00091 }
